title.rendered: Visit from Johnson Controls – Hitachi Middle East Asia

content.rendered: Ahmed Aqel, General Manager – Johnson Controls Hitachi Middle East Asia along with Ahmed El Dessouki, Senior Sales Manager – MEA, Nada Tadros, Regional Sales Manager – UAE and Abdullah Roshan, Senior Technical Product Support Engineer visited TTE at its new corporate offce. The team were hosted by Dilip Sharma, Executive Vice President, Roshan Samuel, Associate Vice President – Trading Division, Nikhil Mohan, Senior Sales Engineer and Mohamed Sharbudeen Ayub, Senior Sales Engineer. A leading and innovative HVAC solutions provider, Hitachi brings to the region a diverse range of cooling solutions and services that offer the best in efficient cooling for households and businesses.

The team were hosted by Dilip Sharma, Executive Vice President, Roshan Samuel, […]
